page.title: 18EDUCATION
page.content:
OUTSIDE LYNEAL SCHOOL by Helen Marshall(a piece of writing done in school)
"With a great deal of pushing and shoving,we all pulled our coats and wellies on and raced out to the playground. It was a sunny,mild day with a slight breeze drifting along from a westerly direction. Looking across to Colemere, the sky was hazy with a tint of purple in it. You could make out the mound of the sand and gravel pit. The hollow echoes of feet on a wooden classroom floor mingled with a plane humming like a sucking vacuum cleaner. Birds were cawing as we moved off down to the village."
